comment: Dr. Rish is super laid back but serious about the work and reading. Read, attend class and participate in discussions. The assignments were easy to navigate and complete. He explained the expections clearly the first time. No surprises.

Dr. Rish is an excellent teacher.  He cares about his students and he is very understanding when unforseen situations come up.  I learned a lot and I enjoyed the readings.  Awesome professor.  Make sure you do the readings and blogs.  You will do fine and you will learn a lot.

He's an amazing professor.  He understand the material extensively and really cares about all of his students.  I not only learned a great deal but he made everyone feel like they were in control while still guiding a well structured curriculum.  I am going to be looking for his classes in the future.

I took Dr. Rish's summer course. He is absolutely awesome! Anytime I needed help, I just sent him an email and he was extremely helpful with his feedback.  He allows for revision after he grades papers which helped my learn a lot. If you do all your work, it is an easy A.
Great teacher, works with the students well
Overall good, sometimes not so personable
